channel.title: Coding on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Coding on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Gemini AI solves coding problem that stumped 139 human teams at ICPC World Finals
item.description: Gemini shows off at another high-level academic competition.

item.title: How to Become a Vibe Coder
item.description: In this episode of Uncanny Valley, WIRED’s senior correspondent Lauren Goode reports back from her brief stint as a vibe coder.

item.title: How to Become a Vibe Coder
item.description: In this episode of Uncanny Valley, WIRED’s senior correspondent Lauren Goode reports back from her brief stint as a vibe coder.

item.title: Why Did a $10 Billion Startup Let Me Vibe-Code for Them—and Why Did I Love It?
item.description: I spent two days at Notion and saw an industry in upheaval. I also shipped some actual code.

item.title: Why Did a $10 Billion Startup Let Me Vibe-Code for Them—and Why Did I Love It?
item.description: I spent two days at Notion and saw an industry in upheaval. I also shipped some actual code.

item.title: In Xcode 26, Apple shows first signs of offering ChatGPT alternatives
item.description: Claude support in Xcode heralds bigger moves across the ecosystem.

item.title: Developers Say GPT-5 Is a Mixed Bag
item.description: Software engineers are finding OpenAI’s new GPT-5 model is helping them think through coding problems—but isn’t much better at actual coding.

item.title: Developers Say GPT-5 Is a Mixed Bag
item.description: Software engineers are finding OpenAI’s new GPT-5 model is helping them think through coding problems—but isn’t much better at actual coding.

item.title: Anthropic Revokes OpenAI's Access to Claude
item.description: OpenAI lost access to the Claude API this week after Anthropic claimed the company was violating its terms of service.

item.title: Anthropic Revokes OpenAI's Access to Claude
item.description: OpenAI lost access to the Claude API this week after Anthropic claimed the company was violating its terms of service.

item.title: Developer survey shows trust in AI coding tools is falling as usage rises
item.description: “AI solutions that are almost right, but not quite” lead to more debugging work.

item.title: Meta Is Going to Let Job Candidates Use AI During Coding Tests
item.description: Mark Zuckerberg has said vibecoding will be a major part of Meta’s engineering work in the near future.

item.title: Meta Is Going to Let Job Candidates Use AI During Coding Tests

item.title: Programmers Aren’t So Humble Anymore—Maybe Because Nobody Codes in Perl
item.description: Perl is a messy, maddening programming language, the “duct tape of the internet.” But at least you can tell it was made by humans.

item.title: Cursor’s New Bugbot Is Designed to Save Vibe Coders From Themselves
item.description: One of the most popular platforms for AI-assisted programming says the next era of vibe coding is all about supercharging error detection.
